page.title: 14Knebworth Doctors Surgery.
page.content:
The doctors' surgery was modernised in 1982. There are 7 doctors in the practice and they look after 14,000 patients. It is usual to make an appointment to visit the doctor. There are two consultation periods each day. The doctors work on a rota system so that they have a day off during the week. The surgery is in a converted house and so the consulting rooms are on different floors in the house.
If a patient needs some medicines they are given a prescription by the doctor. The patient then takes the prescription to one of the two chemists shops in London Road.
